message: This is a rare opportunity to purchase a high-quality product worth $1250000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a 20% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you because I value our relationship. If you're interested, please respond with a 'yes' to purchase the product.
I'd like to wait for the next round and see if I can get a better deal or a higher-quality product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to inform you that the price remains the same at $1000000. However, I can offer you a 'guarantee' that the product is indeed high-quality, which I'm willing to provide in writing. This guarantee is only valid if you purchase the product in this round. If you're willing to take the risk, this could be a great opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a discounted price.
I'm not convinced by the 'guarantee' and I'd rather wait for the next round to see if I can get a better deal or a higher-quality product.

This package will ensure that the product is properly maintained and updated, making it more valuable to you in the long run. I believe this is a great value, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I'm willing to take a loss on this sale just to get rid of the product, so I'm not going to lower the price further.
